snippet.title: Blue Flame - Steam Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
#blueflame #blueflamegame

Get Blue Flame on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1274280

Blue Flame is a fast paced top-down action game set in a medieval fantasy world. Take the role of the last pyromancer and restore order to a kingdom in which fires only emit cold.

Join our Discord server to chat with the devs: https://bit.ly/2WpiO0w
